com.connectsdk.device

Interface SimpleDevicePickerListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DevicePickerListener

    public interface SimpleDevicePickerListener
extends DevicePickerListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPickDevice(ConnectableDevice device)
      Called when device is ready to use (requested permissions approved).
      void onPickDeviceFailed(boolean canceled)
      Called when the picker is canceled by the user or if pairing was unsuccessful.
      void onPrepareDevice(ConnectableDevice device)
      Called when the user selects a device.

    • Method Detail

      • onPrepareDevice

        void onPrepareDevice(ConnectableDevice device)
        Called when the user selects a device. This callback can be used to prepare the device (request permissions, etc) just before attempting to connect.
        Parameters:
        device - selected device

      • onPickDevice

        void onPickDevice(ConnectableDevice device)
        Called when device is ready to use (requested permissions approved).
        Specified by:
        onPickDevice in interface DevicePickerListener
        Parameters:
        device - that is ready to use

      • onPickDeviceFailed

        void onPickDeviceFailed(boolean canceled)
        Called when the picker is canceled by the user or if pairing was unsuccessful.
        Specified by:
        onPickDeviceFailed in interface DevicePickerListener
        Parameters:
        canceled - true if picker was canceled by user, false if due to error
